question: The "Paracel Islands" are located in which waterbody?
explanation: Paracel Islands are a disputed archipelago located in the South China Sea. It is also known as Xisha Islands or Hoang Sa archipelago. This islands houses "Dragon Hole", the deepest underwater sinkhole in the world. In Battle of Paracel Islands of 1974, China took control of the administration of the Paracel Islands from Vietnam.
